attributes.action: make deliberate and persistent "tailgating" a Criminal offence and catch offenders by using cameras.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"Tailgating" (persistently driving a vehicle too close to the rear of another at speed) is a deliberate threat to the lives of the driver and passengers of the  vehicle in front, and leads to many, if not most serious accidents on our roads. The offence is a considered one and no different to a threat using any hazardous but otherwise legitimate tool such as a knife or a shotgun. "Tailgating" should be recognised as a Criminal offence, rather than a mere traffic violation and offenders dealt with accordingly.

Police should be encouraged to target "tailgating" using appropriate technology such as cameras - it appears to be almost ignored at present.

Many lives could be saved and serious injury prevented by a reduction in this deliberately dangerous practice.
